text: Ankit Soni is an Indian cricketer who plays for Gujarat Lions in the Indian Premier League. He was signed up by the franchise in April 2017 as a replacement for the injured Shivil Kaushik. He made his Twenty20 debut for Gujarat Lions in the 2017 Indian Premier League on 27 April 2017. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Indian cricketers Category:Gujarat Lions cricketers Category:Cricketers from Mumbai
title: Ankit Soni
